summary: Pet memorial website project with custom headstone designs featuring individual animals (yorkie, bird, cat) with nameplates and natural elements
architectural_notes: Hero image: headstone memorial with yorkie (Nabi), grass, and pebbles
Top row displays headstone-style memorials for each animal type
Each memorial includes nameplate with animal name at bottom
Description emphasizes uniqueness - no exact duplicates
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Headstone memorial with a realistic bird portrait, nameplate with 'Tweety' at bottom, grass and small pebble stones at base (bird-headstone.dim_600x800.png)
- Headstone memorial with a realistic cat portrait, nameplate with 'Whiskers' at bottom, grass and small pebble stones at base (cat-headstone.dim_600x800.png)

## Edit Images
- Update nameplate text to read 'Nabi' more prominently (yorkie-headstone-nabi.png > yorkie-headstone-nabi-v2.dim_600x800.png)

existing_features.title: Change all instances of 'Eternal Paws' branding to 'Furever in Our Hearts' across the entire site including header logo, footer branding, page title, and any other text references
Replace the top row of showcase images with the headstone memorial photo featuring the yorkie named Nabi
Create headstone-style memorial designs for the bird and cat, each featuring grass and small pebble stones at the base, matching the yorkie headstone aesthetic
Add a nameplate at the bottom of each headstone memorial (yorkie, bird, and cat) displaying the animal's name - Nabi for the yorkie, and appropriate names for the bird and cat
